ipAddresses.description: A list of IP addresses to inspect (e.g., 8.8.8.8, 1.1.1.1, 2606:4700:4700::1111).

performReverseDns.title: ğŸ·ï¸ Perform Reverse DNS
performReverseDns.description: If checked, finds the hostname (PTR record) for each IP.

performGeolocation.title: ğŸŒ Perform Geolocation
performGeolocation.description: If checked, finds the physical location (country, city) for each IP.

performPortScan.title: ğŸš¦ Perform Port Scan
performPortScan.description: If checked, scans the ports listed in the 'Ports to Scan' field.

portsToScan.title: ğŸ”Œ Ports to Scan
portsToScan.description: A list of port numbers to check (e.g., 80, 443, 22). Only used if 'Perform Port Scan' is checked.
